Name: luy-mohammadramadha
Author: Mohammad Ramadhan Sebwa, Ramadhan Hajj Ndeka, Ismail Were, Musa Murasi Salim Kukuya, Yusuf Shiundu Malala, Yahya Wafula Ojwang, Haroon Albert Msah

Translations.Text: Olwa obuhabini bwa Nyasaye nende obwikuli buliitsa
Ne nolola Abandu nibenjila mudini ya Nyasaye mumikanda
Awo ofumie oluyali lwa Nyasaye wuwo, ne omusabe eshileshelo, toto bwene niye Omulesheli muno
